column4: can't get vlc to play an mp3, i also have no sound, is this a codec issue?
more likely a sound problem, not codec
how would i go about checking this?
do youget sound using another application to play media files?
no
i also have no system sounds
so your sound system is not working. what sound card you got?
intel
it's integrated into the laptop
should work out of the box. please check the volumes
double click on the volume icon on your panel.. make sure the volume bars are not set to muted
i've checked and checked again
open the volume window then Edit->preferences. check all boxes. then go back to the window window
then try different options in the volume windows...
thank you very very much
i checked all the boxes and everything worked, i think it was the IEC one that did it
can you change the volume by using the icon on the panel?
no i cannot and my headphone jack also doesn't wok
then right click on the the volume icon and chose preferences
in the popup windows, select the one that worked for you to change the volume
i changed it from capture to HDA Intel (ALSA Mixer, and i can now adjust the volume, but i still get no sound in headphone jack
I don't know any trick for the head jack issue.. never tried to fix it. :\ mabe some one else can help you
